description.$invariant: Automatic Technology America (ATA) is an Australian owned global technology leader in remote access systems for garage doors and gates. The Automatic Technology brand is recognised for providing residential security access control systems. The design philosophy at Automatic Technology is SMART-SIMPLE-SECURE. Using in-house designed SMART technologies, our products deliver outstanding reliability whilst being SIMPLE to operate and provide SECURE access with encryption codes of the highest standard. Since our inception as Automatic Technology over 25 years ago, our world class engineering team have designed and released innovative access control technologies that have been adopted throughout the globe including Europe, Asia, Canada, the Middle East and South Africa. When you choose an Automatic Technology garage door, you’re buying quality and reliability that won’t break the budget.
